attributes.action: Allow diabetic people into the armed forces
attributes.additional_details: As a diabetic in the royal air force air cadets I think we should let diabetics into the armed forces as we do exercises the same as the forces and have a similar structure to the forces. Diabetics can do everything other people can do and shouldn't be any different when it comes to selection and training getting into the forces and being in the forces
attributes.background: Allow diabetic people into the armed forces even if it is just in the UK with no oversees deployment in warzones etc

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Health and fitness requirements are a matter for the individual services, and not the UK Government and Parliament, to set.
